data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Mexox-KMTWIQ7kNvgGK5tRt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAtOqo3cIX7i6OAp3t7Dbb66gn11kqfUxOAmXIBtH2qoA&oe=666D7937)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1BpEDQ7ZZGwQ7kNvgF58Dnb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBmQBx6R-TYB6Gw8do4oUzF3Y_EngWcW0iH9og3mtSlfg&oe=666D86D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OSa0fLr2qzIQ7kNvgEG-Cnr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDxz5JwTRmaasgLd9FRP_98qqgIf6rI2rVl0ESfoOKYXw&oe=666D7209)
